          Called when widget is updated, including when it is created the first time Here, we hook the pressing of the widget to the UI thread, having the UI send a broadcast to the EventButtonHandler if it pressed

Called when widget is updated, including when it is created the first time Here, we hook the pressing of the widget to the UI thread, having the UI send a broadcast to the EventButtonHandler if it pressed
